char_info.desc: The Cousin of the Phantasmal Percussionist

a0.speaker: Sakuya:
a0.dialogue: By sending whatever or whoever was the 'secret weapon' out there, it seems like she must have lost her marbles.

a1.speaker: Sakuya:
a1.dialogue: If that person can cause me to have terrible nightmares, they better not mess or let alone negotiate with them.

a2.speaker: Sakuya:
a2.dialogue: All of her efforts are like putting lipstick on a pig.

a3.speaker: Jeanne:
a3.dialogue: Futile? Worthless? Nah, that's none of my business.

a4.speaker: Sakuya:
a4.dialogue: Are you Raiko's cousin? Since you don't look like her, I have to make sure you are actually her cousin.

a5.speaker: Sakuya:
a5.dialogue: And why the heck did your cousin send you to 'negotiate'?

a6.speaker: Sakuya:
a6.dialogue: Do you know the figure stalking the concert grounds is dangerous?

a7.speaker: Jeanne:
a7.dialogue: Because she wants to. Since I am God... I mean, the vessel of Iesua, and the Son of the Nazarene...

a8.speaker: Jeanne:
a8.dialogue: I can negotiate with just about everyone. And you are wrong though - the person is actually a nice person.

a9.speaker: Jeanne:
a9.dialogue: It was love at first sight when I got a glimpse of them.

a10.speaker: Sakuya:
a10.dialogue: Ugh... A notorious Don Juan, right? You said they are so good-looking.

a11.speaker: Sakuya:
a11.dialogue: Everyone ends up falling in love with them even when catching a glimpse...

a12.speaker: Sakuya:
a12.dialogue: Even though I don't believe in gods, Sumi told me that the people in the Outside World knows that God is chaste.

a13.speaker: Jeanne:
a13.dialogue: I mean, they're too young to do stuff like that.

a14.speaker: Jeanne:
a14.dialogue: All of their followers just maintain friendship and loyalty to them.

a15.speaker: Jeanne:
a15.dialogue: In the case of that one girl, a good relationship.

a16.speaker: Jeanne:
a16.dialogue: And the reason they are here in the first place is to find a certain cambion who went on a rampage.

a17.speaker: Jeanne:
a17.dialogue: He trapped many of his followers inside a pocket dimension.

a18.speaker: Sakuya:
a18.dialogue: All those pocket dimensions with strange text hooey?

a19.speaker: Sakuya:
a19.dialogue: C'mon, this is not THAT grimp place where magical girls are constantly hunting hostile surreal beings.

a20.speaker: Jeanne:
a20.dialogue: It's true. Seriously! This very cambion came with two of her sisters during an incident.

a21.speaker: Jeanne:
a21.dialogue: One of them helped her penetrate into the Great Hakurei Divide.

a22.speaker: Sakuya:
a22.dialogue: I didn't know that, but I know someone who did take part in the incident.

a23.speaker: Sakuya:
a23.dialogue: Reimu, Marisa, Sanae, and that Girl who I barely even know.

a24.speaker: Sakuya:
a24.dialogue: I don't know the weirdo who took part in the incident, but seems like she's based off some unfunny skeleton stories.

a25.speaker: Sakuya:
a25.dialogue: She had dunked on that cambion for sure. End of story, and what you just described is a lie.

a26.speaker: Jeanne:
a26.dialogue: NO! REALLY! Many people had been trapped in the barriers created by that cambion!

a27.speaker: Jeanne:
a27.dialogue: Almost none of them came back, and I have to rescue them!
